action.name: Set text
action.param: "Errors: " & (3 - errors) & newline & "Chocolates delivered: " & normalCounter & newline & "Normal chocolates sorted: " & bombonColorSeparadoCounter & newline & "Defective chocolates sorted: " & defectuosoCounter

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Fehler: " & (3 - errors) & newline & "Gelieferte Pralinen: " & normalCounter & newline & "Sortierte normale Pralinen: " & bombonColorSeparadoCounter & newline & "Sortierte fehlerhafte Pralinen: " & defectuosoCounter

action.param: "Cometiste algunos errores, pero no te desanimes. ¡Inténtalo nuevamente!"
